content: Hi all, I need to create a profile for a scenario in which doctor asks the patient about his complaints. The complaints are categorized into constitutional (fever, chills etc), eye (recent visual problem, blurring etc), cardiovascular (chest pain, palpitations etc) and many more. Which resource shall I pick to create the profile? Thank you
It seems Observation, Condition and possibly ClinicalImpression will be the main ones for this.
